QuestData.Title: The Chen Taste Test
QuestData.Description: Uncle Chen is going to love this. Or... he might tell us to find something sweeter. He's kind of dumb like that.$b$bLet's get this grain back to him at Halfhill.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Chen Stormstout at Halfhill in the Valley of the Four Winds.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah! Now these are some beautifully malted grains. The two of you have a good eye and nose.
